cab.content: Colonel I, Dally toes.SECRETBATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 14th JULY, 1918.There Is no change in the general situation on the Western an$ Italian fronts.In Albania, the French forces have cleared the enemy from the angle of the DEVOLI and TOMORITSA rivers and the allied line runs approximately as follows:-RASHTHANI - SELCHANI - junction of the DEVOLI and TOMORITSA rivers - North of BERAT - thence along the river SEMENI where the Italians are in contact with the enemy on the right bank. The clearing of the ground between the VOYUSA and the SEMENI continues. The Italians have captured 1,800 prisoners In all and the French 400.General Staff. f "-- /14th July, 1018.War Office, S.W.I.Issued at 12,20 p,m.f
